home.title: Naroa Gutiérrez Gil
home.subtitle: There is no error. Only waiting.

about.title: Naroa Gutiérrez Gil
about.bio_1: I paint. I draw. I portray.
about.bio_2: I work mainly with graphite, charcoal, and acrylic. My work explores the body and the face as territories of presence.
about.bio_3: I do not seek superficial resemblance. I seek what remains when the pose is gone.
about.quote: Nothing is exclusive. Reality complements itself.
about.method_text: I work from error as a method and waiting as a tool. Not all accidents are corrected. Not all time is filled.
